Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.mojo

Class ArtifactsMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.mojo.ArtifactsMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
@Mojo(name="artifacts",
      defaultPhase=VERIFY,
      requiresProject=true,
      inheritByDefault=false,
      threadSafe=true)
public class ArtifactsMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
Compute project artifact's checksum digests and store them in individual files and/or a summary file. Optionally attaches the checksum files as additional project artifacts.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud

    • NAME

      public static final String NAME
      The mojo name.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • individualFiles

      @Parameter(defaultValue="true") protected boolean individualFiles
      Indicates whether the build will store checksums in separate files (one file per algorithm per artifact).
      Since:
      1.0

    • individualFilesOutputDirectory

      @Parameter protected String individualFilesOutputDirectory
      The directory where output files will be stored. Leave unset to have each file next to the source file.
      Since:
      1.0

    • csvSummary

      @Parameter(defaultValue="false") protected boolean csvSummary
      Indicates whether the build will store checksums to a single CSV summary file.
      Since:
      1.0

    • csvSummaryFile

      @Parameter(defaultValue="artifacts-checksums.csv") protected String csvSummaryFile
      The name of the summary file created if the option is activated.
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      csvSummary

    • xmlSummary

      @Parameter(defaultValue="false") protected boolean xmlSummary
      Indicates whether the build will store checksums to a single XML summary file.
      Since:
      1.0

    • xmlSummaryFile

      @Parameter(defaultValue="artifacts-checksums.xml") protected String xmlSummaryFile
      The name of the summary file created if the option is activated.
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      xmlSummary

    • shasumSummary

      @Parameter(defaultValue="false") protected boolean shasumSummary
      Indicates whether the build will store checksums to a single shasum summary file.
      Since:
      1.3

    • shasumSummaryFile

      @Parameter(defaultValue="artifacts-checksums.sha") protected String shasumSummaryFile
      The name of the summary file created if the option is activated.
      Since:
      1.3
      See Also:
      shasumSummary

    • appendFilename

      @Parameter(defaultValue="false") protected boolean appendFilename
      Append the artifact filename in the generated checksum file. This parameter require the parameter individualFiles be equal to true.
      Since:
      1.4
      See Also:
      individualFiles

    • excludeMainArtifact

      @Parameter(defaultValue="false") protected boolean excludeMainArtifact
      Whether to skip checksum generation for the project's main artifact.

    • includeClassifiers

      @Parameter protected String includeClassifiers
      Comma-separated list of classifiers. For all secondary project artifacts having any of the given classifiers checksums are generated. If not set all secondary project artifacts are considered.

    • excludeClassifiers

      @Parameter protected String excludeClassifiers
      Comma-separated list of classifiers. For all secondary project artifacts having any of the given classifiers checksums are not generated. Takes precedence over includeClassifiers.

    • project

      @Parameter(property="project", required=true, readonly=true) protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
      The Maven project.
      Since:
      1.0

    • projectHelper

      @Component protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProjectHelper projectHelper
      The Maven Project Helper. Used to attach checksums as build artifacts.
      Since:
      1.3

    • algorithms

      @Parameter protected List<String> algorithms
      The list of checksum algorithms used.

      Default value is MD5 and SHA-1.

      Allowed values are Cksum, CRC32, BLAKE2B-160, BLAKE2B-256, BLAKE2B-384, BLAKE2B-512, GOST3411, GOST3411-2012-256, GOST3411-2012-512, KECCAK-224, KECCAK-256, KECCAK-288, KECCAK-384, KECCAK-512, MD2, MD4, MD5, RIPEMD128, RIPEMD160, RIPEMD256, RIPEMD320, SHA, SHA-1, SHA-224, SHA-256, SHA3-224, SHA3-256, SHA3-384, SHA3-512, SHA-384, SHA-512, SHA-512/224, SHA-512/256, SKEIN-1024-1024, SKEIN-1024-384, SKEIN-1024-512, SKEIN-256-128, SKEIN-256-160, SKEIN-256-224, SKEIN-256-256, SKEIN-512-128, SKEIN-512-160, SKEIN-512-224, SKEIN-512-256, SKEIN-512-384, SKEIN-512-512, SM3, TIGER and WHIRLPOOL.

      Use the following syntax: 

      <algorithms>
   <algorithm>MD5</algorithm>
   <algorithm>SHA-1</algorithm>
 </algorithms>
      Since:
      1.0

    • failOnError

      @Parameter(defaultValue="true") protected boolean failOnError
      Indicates whether the build will fail if there are errors.
      Since:
      1.0

    • encoding

      @Parameter(property="encoding", defaultValue="${project.build.sourceEncoding}") protected String encoding
      Encoding to use for generated files.
      Since:
      1.0

    • attachChecksums

      @Parameter(property="attachChecksums", defaultValue="false") protected boolean attachChecksums
      Should the checksums be attached as build artifacts.
      Since:
      1.3

    • quiet

      @Parameter(defaultValue="false") protected boolean quiet
      Indicates whether the build will print checksums in the build log.
      Since:
      1.0

    • includeRelativePath

      @Parameter(defaultValue="false") protected boolean includeRelativePath
      Indicates whether the build will output relative path information as well.
      Since:
      1.3

    • relativeSubPath

      @Parameter(defaultValue="") protected String relativeSubPath
      Sub path to use as the root of the relative path when including relative path in xml/csv files
      Since:
      1.3

      Constructor.

  • Method Details

    • getFilesToProcess

      protected List<ChecksumFile> getFilesToProcess()
      Build the list of files from which digests should be generated.

      The list is composed of the project main and attached artifacts.

      Returns:
      the list of files that should be processed.
      See Also:
      hasValidFile(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact)

    • hasValidFile

      protected boolean hasValidFile​(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact artifact)
      Decide whether the artifact file should be processed.

      Excludes the project POM file and any file outside the build directory, because this could lead to writing files on the user local repository for example.

      Parameters:
      artifact - the artifact to check.
      Returns:
      true if the artifact should be included in the files to process.
